defitem.label: Encoded by:
defitem.item: Machine-readable finding aid derived from MARC record by David Sun.

titlepage.p: © 2008 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Memoranda and news summaries prepared daily for Herbert Hoover, administrator of the United States Food Administration; and correspondence and printed matter relating to the Food Administration, American politics and government, and Herbert Hoover.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Everett Somerville Brown papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1950.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the library catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Everett Somerville Brown papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan
United States Food Administration records, Hoover Institution Archives
Herbert Hoover papers, Hoover Institution Archives
Herbert Hoover subject collection, Hoover Institution Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: United States Food Administration staff member, 1917-1920. Professor of political science at the University of Michigan.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Memoranda and news summaries prepared daily for Herbert Hoover, administrator of the United States Food Administration; and correspondence and printed matter, relating to the Food Administration, American politics and government, and Herbert Hoover.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1914-1918--Food question.
World War, 1914-1918--United States.
